NAME : Methamphetamine CHEMICAL NAME : (S)-N,a-Dimethylbenzene-ethanamine; d-N-methylamphetamine; ALTERNATE CHEMICAL NAMES : d-deoxyephedrine; d-disoxyephedrine; ALTERNATE CHEMICAL NAMES : 1-phenyl-2-methylaminopropane; d-phenylisopropylmethyl-amine CHEMICAL FORMULA C 10 H 15 N MOLECULAR WEIGHT 149.24 From the Merck Index 12th Edition

It appears under the "Chemicals" category, specifically within the methamphetamine (meth) entry, and is accompanied by merchandising and navigation links.
